list.title: Lending Stream website revamp
list.subtitle: The lead product website of Gain Credit
details: The client facing website of Lending Stream was brought to the most modern and strict standards proving a very solid platform for content editors to push products and updates to the market quickly while positioning itself very high on Google rankings. At launch the website was not only fully semantic and conformant to W3C standards but got 100% Lighthouse score including SEO and Accessibility (for which it passes WCAG 2.1 AA / AAA standards).

The CMS and React middleware used make even dynamic pages load in under two seconds, while vector graphics and well compressed assets were used making it extremely responsive and pleasing as a user experience.

list.title: NewDay's Aquacard rebrand
list.subtitle: The main website of the most successful financial product of Newday
details: In a team of just two developers we created the award winning public facing website for https://www.aquacard.co.uk/
It performed amazingly surpassing expected sales by 30%! It is amazingly fast to load on any device - far ahead of competitor's websites.
The solution uses CMS with Umbraco ASP.net framework and passes all WCAG 2.0 accessibility standards.

list.title: Flair 7 UX/UI for Mark Roberts Motion Control
list.subtitle: Flair is MRMC’s premier motion control software
details: Flair is MRMC’s premier motion control software. Designed to give exceptional command over camera movement, Flair precisely controls up to 500 axes of motion, is fully compatible with all of our motion control rigs, heads and accessories and interfaces seamlessly with CGI packages.
Flair 7 is the tool that makes your vision reality.
I was in charge of all the UX/UI components including 3D models and full documentation for implementation of controls

list.title: Blippar Developers Portal
list.subtitle: Public portal created from zero to make available worldwide the development of custom 3D Augmented Reality experiences with JavaScript.
details: I was the main architect of this project being tasked with its overall design, HTML/CSS development, creating documentation and demos. There is an extensive documentation that will guide you through AR creation, testing and publishing. The Examples section is filled with demos and tutorials that you can try and download, as well as a some tips and tricks to guide your through AR development.
It's filled with blipp tutorials and demos that you can try and download as well as a collection of tips and tricks from to help your development process.

list.title: MILO Champions
list.subtitle: Project collaboration with a AR powered app for Nestle.
details: Start your journey with the MILO Champ Squad app and the Champ Band. MILO Champ Squad app is an exciting new health, fitness and activity tracker designed to help kids get the most out of every day. Track your child’s activity and food intake to make sure they’re meeting their daily energy targets. Fun, interactive games encouraging kids to learn new sports skills and team up with friends to compete in physical challenges.
I created the AR framework for dynamic loading of 2D and 3D assets and bone animations and train the personnel in charge of developing the app while creating detailed technical documentation.

list.title: Printed catalogues
list.subtitle: Some of the printed publications created for big campaigns.
details: Back when print was king the need for high quality eye-catching catalogues was big. The design of these publications involved 3D modeling and rendering, taking photos of the products on location and agreeing with major brands on design trends to match the quality and image of their products.
